aayisha (rali) thumiya wartha karayi: nabi (sal) thuman thiraya aath kara balana wita thamange siya mitha්rayin abu bakr (rali) peratu kotagena salathaya karamin sitiyaha, mema pa්rithimath darshanaya dutu nabi (sal) thuman, allahta pa්rashansa kara ohuge nayakathwaya yatathema samajaya pela gasennata pi්raya kalaha, pasuwa pawasuha: ”janayini!
man paudgalikawa ee sambandhayata ekathu wenna kamathi naha.
ee wagema mun ehema bila yanneth na wageyi.
namuth pasuwa ema ankayata katha kalahoth prathicharayak nomatha.
kiyapanko age nokara.."
ema dayadaya ithamath pohosath kalayakata elabenne ema manawayan athara athi wu aacharadharmayan hewath sadacharayange wardhanayath samagaya.
